articles.content: Realme Narzo 60 smartphone series is now official in India. The series gets two smartphones: Narzo 60 and Narzo 60 Pro. Both smartphones are powered by MediaTek chipsets, feature FHD+ AMOLED displays… [+264 chars]

articles.content: A United States-based study, published in Psychological Science suggests that people who are lonely dont quite see the world the same way as nonlonely individuals. Additionally, it also suggests that… [+3358 chars]
